actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: Recognizing the contributions of the New York Public Library's Schomburg Center for Research in Black Culture in educating the people of the United States about the African-American migration experience, and for other purposes.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues
